title: How to Access Chegg Without Paying: 8 Clever Methods

steps.title: Go to https://auth0.identity1.chegg.com/u/login/identifier?state=hKFo2SBqTFltcVgzdjBieTlFN0FJMjhnYnZLa3JtU1RwdEtZTaFur3VuaXZlcnNhbC1sb2dpbqN0aWTZIHZQMGZoSFI4UEpXcDhoRk1WSk4yMEJmY2tsZ1JvbkRfo2NpZNkgSzZvdXQ3UmFsRW9rSFFDdVJNc0xDMEJud25YN1ZiYzI in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://auth0.identity1.chegg.com/u/login/identifier?state=hKFo2SBqTFltcVgzdjBieTlFN0FJMjhnYnZLa3JtU1RwdEtZTaFur3VuaXZlcnNhbC1sb2dpbqN0aWTZIHZQMGZoSFI4UEpXcDhoRk1WSk4yMEJmY2tsZ1JvbkRfo2NpZNkgSzZvdXQ3UmFsRW9rSFFDdVJNc0xDMEJud25YN1ZiYzI in a web browser. You can sign up for a free trial whenever one is offered. Free trials are not always available; however, some schools or businesses offer them. If you don't have a free trial, try this article's other methods.

steps.title: Enter your email address and create a password.
steps.content: Enter your email address and create a password. Enter a .edu email to trigger the free trial portion. Remember to make your password secure yet something you won't forget .

steps.title: Add information about your school.
steps.content: Add information about your school. This includes your school's name, level of study, and what year you're in.

steps.title: Click Create account.
steps.content: Click Create account . It's an orange button that will create your login.

steps.title: Follow the instructions given with the free trial to complete the process.
steps.content: Follow the instructions given with the free trial to complete the process. You might have a special link to go to or be instructed to click Join Now and sign up for a subscription. Free trials are not always offered, so you might need to try other methods if you don't have one. Even if you can't find a free trial, your library might have a Chegg account that allows students to use from campus computers.

steps.title: Search for Chegg Answer Viewer in the "Communities" section.
steps.content: Search for Chegg Answer Viewer in the "Communities" section. You can join and bookmark as many Subreddits as you need. You might be able to find a Subreddit that covers your syllabus! This can be difficult in a smaller school, but this is how you can find Chegg answers for free on Reddit. These communities change a lot, so one Subreddit may not work down in a few weeks, but another will pop up. You can try Subreddits like r/Chegg_Unlocks .

steps.title: Open Discord and search for chegg.
steps.content: Open Discord and search for chegg . Click a server to join ; then, you can browse the server for the answers you're looking for! If you can't find the answers by browsing, ask in a channel and hopefully someone will help you.

steps.title: Open Telegram and search for Chegg Free Answers.
steps.content: Open Telegram and search for Chegg Free Answers . Join a group that you like , then search for answers! If you can't find your answer, ask the group for help.

steps.title: Copy the URL of the question from Chegg.
steps.content: Copy the URL of the question from Chegg. Select the text and press Ctrl + C (Windows) or Cmd + C (Mac) to copy the link.

steps.title: Go to https://homeworkify.net/ and paste the URL into the text field.
steps.content: Go to https://homeworkify.net/ and paste the URL into the text field. With your cursor inside the text field, press Ctrl + V (Windows) or Cmd + V (Mac). Click Search to continue.

steps.title: Enter your email and the Captcha.
steps.content: Enter your email and the Captcha. To continue, you need to verify that you aren't a bot. Click Submit to continue. Once you do, you'll see the Chegg answer shown on the Homeworkify site. There are other free resources, like PremiumInfo and StudyLib, so you never have to pay for a service as a student.

steps.title: Reduce the overall cost by having more people share an account.
steps.content: Reduce the overall cost by having more people share an account. Since the site benefits everyone, convincing your friends to share an account with you shouldn't be difficult.

steps.title: Answer the surveys in Google Rewards and transfer your earnings to PayPal.
steps.content: Answer the surveys in Google Rewards and transfer your earnings to PayPal. You can pay for Chegg with PayPal, which is also funded by your Google Rewards. Google Rewards is an app you can download from the App Store or Google Play Store. Simply Google Opinion Rewards to start answering surveys and getting paid. Users with iPhones can have their rewards go to Paypal while Android users automatically have their rewards go directly to the Google Play Store. [1] X Research source If you're using an iPhone, make sure you sign into Google Opinion Rewards with the same email address as your PayPal account. [2] X Research source

steps.title: If you don't like Chegg, you can try any of the following:
steps.content: If you don't like Chegg, you can try any of the following: Quizlet . This used to be called Slader, but Quizlet purchased it in 2021. You can use the site for free to study with flashcards, answer practice questions, and interact with diagrams and activities. Pay for a subscription to be able to do more, like using Q-Chat, Study Guides, Learn mode, Test mode, access expert solutions, and more. You can sign up for a free 7-day trial , but it's much cheaper than Chegg. Skooli is set up more like a tutoring site, so you don't have a monthly subscription fee. Instead, pay when you use the services offered by Skooli. You can get together with a tutor, learn from digital classrooms, and access homework help.
